berlin
Interface AI

public interface AI

The artificial intelligence interface. This is the interface you must implement when you create an AI that will play Berlin. Once implemented, your class can access the game state via the Game object.

Method Summary
 void update(Game game)
          The update method of your AI.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(Game game)
The update method of your AI. This method is called at every game's turn.

Parameters:
game - contains the state of the game and is also used to create the list of Move that you must send at the end of each turn.
